org.qbroker.jms

Class QConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qbroker.jms.JMSQConnector
      • org.qbroker.jms.QConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.jms.ExceptionListener, QueueConnector

    public class QConnector
extends JMSQConnector
    QConnector connects to a JMS queue and initializes one of the operations, such as browse, query, get or put. It supports repeated browse on a queue with auto increment of JMSTimestamp. But it requires Mode is set to daemon and SequentialSearch is on. The application is supposed to reset the browser every time with null string as the only argument. If ReferenceFile is defined, the state info will be persisted to the file for restart.
    Author:
    yannanlu@yahoo.com
